definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: For this purpose, the laboratory compares its evidence to samples maintained in archives.
sentences.chinese: 为此，实验室会将证物和保管在柜子中的样本做比较。

sentences.english: It was an ancient graffiti providing evidence of the presence of Peter's body in the necropolis .
sentences.chinese: 这件古老的证物证明了伯多禄的遗体就在这个墓地。

sentences.english: Article 68 The administrative appellant or intervenor appellant may present the documentary evidence or other evidence during the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 第68条诉愿人或参加人得提出证据书类或证物。

sentences.english: She has killed Jamey and planted evidence to suggest it was a suicide.
sentences.chinese: 是她杀了杰米而且安置了证物，弄成自杀的假象。

sentences.english: They are responsible for securing the scene so no evidence isdestroyed.
sentences.chinese: 警官的职责是保护现场防止有证物被毁。

sentences.english: Gang village will report the results of the survey to Wu Zhongyi lang, the witness in.
sentences.chinese: 冈村将调查结果汇报给武忠一郎，此事人证物证具在。

sentences.english: I show you Exhibit 3 and ask you if you recognize that picture?
sentences.chinese: 这是3号证物，你认识这张照片里的人吗？

sentences.english: He eliminates evidence and witnesses with brutal, emotionless efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 他残酷无情地抹消证人和证物。

sentences.english: I secretly had a doe killed and took the proofs from it.
sentences.chinese: 我悄悄地杀了一头鹿，取了那些证物。

definition: oral confession (as opposed to 筆供|笔供[bi3 gong4])/statement/deposition
to put down in writing/to take down notes/transcript/record
